title: 5 Tech Growth Stocks I'm Buying Hand Over Fist During This Correction
text: I'm taking advantage of the recent market selloff to increase my exposure to high-quality growth/tech stocks. I don't know when this correction will end or which sector will lead the market this year, but high quality tech companies can beat the market in the long run.

title: Microsoft Stock: You Can't Be Disappointed With Its Earnings - Still In The Buy Zone
text: Microsoft Stock: You Can't Be Disappointed With Its Earnings - Still In The Buy Zone

title: Where did most of Microsoft's revenue come from? A quick review into Microsoft earnings.
text: Revenues of $51.7 billion were posted by the Seattle-based software behemoth, up 20% from the same quarter last year and well ahead of projections.

title: Microsoft released the fourth-quarter report and surpassed estimates on the top and bottom lines
text: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) delivered higher earnings and revenue than predicted, for the fiscal second quarter. Initially, the shares fell in extended trading but then turned positive, after the company issued a sales projection that likewise exceeded expectations.

title: Stocks Climb as Microsoft, Tesla Gain Ahead of Rate Announcement
text: After two days of volatile trading, U.S. equity markets remain in the green as investors await the outcome of the latest Federal Reserve meeting.

title: Stocks Climb as Microsoft, Tesla Gain Ahead of Rate Announcement
text: Financial news digest for Jan. 26 with stock, bond, cryptocurrency and markets news. Breaking news on companies, MNA, earnings and interest rates.

title: Microsoft's (MSFT) Q2 Earnings & Revenues Surpass Estimates
text: Microsoft's (MSFT) second-quarter fiscal 2022 results reflect continued strength in the Azure cloud platform and Teams app.

title: The Ratings Game: Microsoft earnings offer upbeat signs for ‘vast majority of the software sector,' say analysts
text: Microsoft Corp. helped give a jolt to software stocks after issuing an earnings report and outlook that drew wide praise.

title: Microsoft: Boringly Reliable Double-Digit Growth In Q2 FY22
text: Microsoft released Q2 FY22 results overnight, again showing double-digit growth, but shares first crashed 8% and then recovered to 5.4% up. Driven by a structural growth in technology spending and market share gains, Microsoft revenues, EBIT and EPS all grew 20%+ year-on-year.

title: Deep Dive: 24 software stocks, including Microsoft, expected to rise by double digits over the next year
text: During this period of sharp declines for technology stocks, valuations to earnings estimates have fallen more quickly than share prices have. This “re-rating” of the industry underlines the growth that continues as the stock prices fall.

title: Wednesday Morning's 5 Tech Stock Movers
text: Tech stocks got off to a good start Wednesday morning. The Nasdaq was up about 2.3% in the first few minutes of trading.

title: Stock Market Today: Dow Jones, S&P 500 Rebounds; Microsoft Rebounds Ahead Of FOMC Meeting
text: Investors are eagerly waiting for the Federal Reserve policy-setting meeting.

title: Stocks Gain as Tech Rallies and Investors Await Fed Rate Decision
text: U.S. stocks are moving higher, led by tech, after another volatile trading day ahead of a Fed announcement about the future of monetary policy.

title: After a Solid 2021, Can M&A & Its ETF Soar in 2022?
text: U.S. M&A activity totaled $2.5 trillion in 2021, breaching the 2015 peak. Though rising rate worries and a tumbling stock market are drags on the M&A activity in 2022, cash cushion and some emerging trends may buoy this corporate activity this year as well.

title: Microsoft: Defining Its Future With Gaming, Metaverse, And Cloud
text: Microsoft's Q2-2022 results are encouraging, and the stock price pullback provides an attractive entry point. The company has recently made one of the biggest all-cash acquisition transactions in history, buying out Activision.

title: Why Microsoft Shares Are Trading Higher Today
text: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ: MSFT) shares are trading higher after the company reported better-than-expected second-quarter earnings per share and sales results. The company also issued third-quarter guidance.

title: Microsoft: An Ever Increasing Cash Flow Machine
text: In 2012, Microsoft was producing ~$30 billion in annual operating cash flow.

title: Microsoft's Earnings Delivered. The Market—and These 11 Stocks—Could Gain.
text: The stock market was looking for strong earnings from Microsoft, and the company delivered. The software giant's outlook also is good news for its peers.

title: Microsoft's Earnings Delivered. The Market — and These 11 Stocks — Could Gain.
text: The stock market was looking for strong earnings from Microsoft, and the company delivered. The software giant's outlook also is good news for its peers.

title: Microsoft's $69 billion acquisition target Activision Blizzard has declined to voluntarily recognize a new union
text: The newly formed Game Workers Alliance says it's petitioning the NLRB to force Activision to recognize it.

title: Better Metaverse Stock: Meta Platforms vs. Microsoft
text: Which tech giant can better serve investors hoping to benefit from the growth of the metaverse?

title: Dow futures jump as Microsoft leads, Fed decision on tap
text: U.S. equity futures were trading higher ahead of the conclusion of the Federal Reserve's policy meeting.

title: Microsoft agrees to change Xbox auto-renewal practices in Britain
text: Microsoft has agreed to make changes to how it renews Xbox online gaming subscriptions in Britain, after the UK competition regulator raised concerns about the automatic renewal of such subscriptions for customers.

title: Microsoft Earnings Highlight the Powerhouse the Company Has Become
text: The software giant is still delivering rapid revenue and earnings growth for investors -- and more of this is likely on the way.

title: Microsoft cloud growth forecast bodes well for tech rivals, too
text: After a brief scare, Microsoft Corp reassured tech investors late on Tuesday that the enterprise internet cloud business category has plenty of room to grow.

title: Microsoft: Undervalued And Is Best Positioned Growth Stock, Buy On Dips
text: Microsoft reported solid results and guided ahead of consensus estimates; however, some investors felt that Azure revenue growth slowed (46% Y/Y versus a prior quarter of 48%Y/Y), leading to weakness.

title: Nasdaq futures jump 2% after Microsoft's strong forecast; Fed decision looms
text: U.S. stock futures rose on Wednesday, with a surge in Microsoft lifting Nasdaq 100 futures, while investors keenly awaited the Federal Reserve's monetary policy decision later in the day.

title: Microsoft sees forecast-beating revenue growth in Q3 after better-than-expected Q2 numbers
text: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) forecast revenues in the range of US$48.5bn-US$49.3bn for its fiscal third quarter, above market estimates of US$48.23bn. The guidance followed the software giant's earnings release for the second quarter ended 31 December 2021, which showed revenues of US$51.73bn, up 20% year-on-year and exceeding the US$50.88 predicted by analysts.
